project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the project are to : a) assist the National Power Authority (NPA) carry out long delayed maintenance and rehabilitation of its Western Area generation, subtransmission, and distribution facilities; and b) strengthen NPA as an institution in order to lay the foundations for an autonomous and commercially viable entity.  The project includes three main components : 1) maintenance and rehabilitation of generation facilities, and replacement of three decommissioned generators with two new ones; 2) rehabilitation and improvements in the subtransmission and distribution network; and 3) institutional strengthening of NPA through revision of the NPA Act, contracting a private firm to manage NPA, and training for NPA staff.
